name: Aquadelic GT
description: A boat racing game in the style of kart racing â€“ easy to learn, but challenging to master.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB RAM, OpenGL Driver installed Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Video card must support OpenGL Shader Model 2.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB RAM, OpenGL Driver installed Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Video card must support OpenGL Shader Model 2.

reviews.review_text: Really awesome casual racing game. Reminds me about NFS Underground 2. Beautiful locations, ambient ost and good(for me at least) physics. Completely worth its price.
